content.query:
use oxemarine_ldw
GO

if object_id('bronze.dbc_lookup') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dbc_lookup

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dbc_lookup
    ( PKid              int,
      [LookupColName]   varchar(20),
      [LookupRefNo]     varchar(10),
      [LU_Key]          int,
      [LU_Value]        varchar(50) )  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'fs-dbc/DBC_Lookup.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 1,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dbc_lookup'
    )
;
--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dbc_lookup

--select * from bronze.dbc_lookup


if object_id('bronze.calendar') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar
    ( date_key           int ,
        [Date]           Date ,
        [year]           SMALLINT ,
        [month]          TINYINT ,
        [day]            TINYINT ,
        [day_name]       varchar(10) ,
        day_of_year      SMALLINT ,
        week_of_month    TINYINT ,
        week_of_year     TINYINT ,
        month_name       varchar(10) ,
        year_month       int ,
        year_week        int  )  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'fs-dbc/calendar.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 1,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/calendar'
    )
;
--select * from bronze.calendar

/* skip csv creation
if object_id('bronze.device') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.device

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.device
    ( timestamp             datetime2(0) ,
        ActualClutchSlip    SMALLINT ,
        ControlheadPosition SMALLINT ,
        PropellerSpeed      FLOAT ,
        RequestClutchSlip   SMALLINT ,
        EngineSpeed         FLOAT ,
        BoostPressure       FLOAT ,
        PttTrim             SMALLINT ,
        GearboxOilPressure  FLOAT ,
        GearboxGear         SMALLINT ,
        PressureSource      SMALLINT ,
        AtmosphericPressure FLOAT ,
        _GearboxOilPressure FLOAT ,
	      _EngineOilPressure  FLOAT ,
	      FuelRailPressure    FLOAT ,
	      TemperatueSource    SMALLINT ,
	      IntakeManifoldTemp  FLOAT ,
	      EcuTemp             FLOAT   )  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = '/raw/**',  
        DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format,

    )

;
select top 1000 * from bronze.device
*/

if object_id('bronze.fault_code') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.fault_code

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.fault_code
    ( SPN            int,
      FMI            int,
      DropCode           int,
      Description    varchar(50))  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'fs-dbc/FaultCodes.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 1,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dbc_lookup'
    )
;
select * from bronze.fault_code
